conversion_verification.notes: The 3D model presents a consistent orthographic-angled cutaway that accurately extrudes the 2D plan.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Walls have uniform height and thickness; clear separation between floor plane and vertical structures.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High fidelity to layout; minor simplification of window bay geometry in the living area compared to 2D detail.

interior_elements.notes: Excellent furniture mapping including kitchen appliances and bathroom fixtures. Scale is highly accurate.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering with soft lighting; professional presentation with no artifacts.

detected_errors.description: The window bay in the upper living area is simplified into a flatter plane compared to the angled lines in the 2D plan.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D conversion that preserves the exact layout and furniture placement of the source architectural drawing.
